input.sentences: art can be brown and plain .
art is in the eye of the beholder .
output.sentences: Our professor wanted us to look at ordinary objects and see how it can turn into a form of art.
This included looking at the metal brown roof and finding the art in it.
We also looked at reclaimed items that were turned into newer art pieces.
Even an old fire hydrant can turn into art.
All things can turn into art depending on the eye of the beholder.
